DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the effectiveness of silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.
DOC.brief_title: Addition of Silver Nanoparticles to a Orthodontic Primer in Preventing Enamel Demineralization Adjacent Brackets
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized, split mouth, double-blind, placebo controlled trial. Half of the mouth was applied silver nanoparticles incorporated into the primer orthodontic Transbond XT and the other half with primer-bond as placebo. Evaluate the effectiveness with Diagnodent - pen in preventing enamel demineralization adjacent to brackets.
DOC.criteria: Patients candidates for orthodontic treatment. Patients with O.D 11 and / or 21 absent. Patients who present dentures of any kind in OD 11 and 21. Patients presenting endodontic OD 11 and 21. Patients presenting data gingivitis day cementing brackets.
